Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This is the Board class. This is the UI class, which makes calls to the square class when an action is performed.
